response.original_title: First Aid Training: Open and Closed Wounds
response.overview: Great footage of various cuts and how to bandage them. Highlights practical application of first aid techniques showing different types of open and closed wounds, and the proper methods of first aid treatment. Demonstrates control of bleeding, application of sterile dressings, cravat and triangular cover bandages, and care of the injured for physical shock. Stresses the importance of obtaining competent medical assistance.
response.title: First Aid Training: Open and Closed Wounds
